title: Interview with Professor Tariq Modood (Part 1)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Professor Tariq Modood from the University of Bristol. In this first part, Tariq discusses his upbringing, moving to Britain, his early education and his journey into Sociology. Tariq also describes his literacy influences in both Philosophy and Sociology.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
